home.page_description: View your conversion statistics and recent activity

profile.page_description: Manage your profile information and account settings
profile.title: Profile Information
profile.description: Update your username and display preferences
profile.email_description: Manage your email address and verification status
profile.email_not_verified: Your email address is not verified. Click here to verify your email.
profile.email_hint: Your primary email will be used for account-related notifications.
profile.security_description: Change your password regularly to keep your account secure
profile.password_hint: Use a strong password with at least 8 characters.

billing.page_description: Manage your subscription, payment methods, and billing history
billing.plan_renews: Your plan renews automatically each month
billing.remove_card_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this payment method? This action cannot be undone.
billing.default_payment_method: Your default payment method will be charged automatically.
billing.billing_history_description: View and download your past invoices
billing.invoices_appear: Your invoices will appear here once you have a paid subscription
billing.invoices_generated: Invoices are generated monthly for paid subscriptions.

tokens.page_description: Manage your API tokens for programmatic access
tokens.title: API Tokens
tokens.description: Manage your API tokens for programmatic access
tokens.api_documentation_description: Learn how to use our API to integrate GridExtract into your applications
tokens.keep_secure: Keep your tokens secure. Never share them in publicly accessible areas.
tokens.create_token_description: Give your token a descriptive name to help you remember what it's used for.
tokens.delete_token_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? Any applications using this token will lose access immediately.

settings.page_description: Configure your preferences, appearance, and notification settings
settings.theme_changes: Theme changes apply immediately across all pages.
settings.timezone_description: Set your preferred timezone for dates and times
settings.timezone_affects: Timezone affects how dates and times are displayed.
settings.email_notifications_description: Receive notifications about your account activity
settings.weekly_reports_description: Get weekly summaries of your usage statistics
settings.marketing_emails_description: Receive updates about new features and promotions
settings.change_anytime: You can change these settings at any time.

receipts.page_description: View and download your invoices and billing history
receipts.title: Invoices
receipts.invoice_payment_started: Invoice payment started. It might take a few minutes until the invoice is marked as paid.
receipts.no_invoices_description: You will find your invoices here and in your email inbox as soon as the invoice is paid.

plans.page_description: Manage your subscription plan and view billing details
plans.title: Subscription Plans
plans.not_renewed_hint: Your subscription was cancelled. You will not be billed anymore.
plans.subscription_changed: Your subscription has been changed successfully.
plans.subscription_cancelled: Your subscription has been cancelled successfully.
plans.contact_support: Something went wrong! Please contact support.

subscription.page_description: Select the perfect plan for your needs and manage your subscription

SUBSCRIPTION.page_description: Select the perfect plan for your needs and manage your subscription
SUBSCRIPTION.title: Choose Your Plan
SUBSCRIPTION.subtitle: Select the perfect plan for your needs. Upgrade or downgrade anytime.
SUBSCRIPTION.already_free: You're already on the free plan
SUBSCRIPTION.redirect_description: You will be redirected to complete your payment
SUBSCRIPTION.stripe_integration: Stripe checkout integration to be implemented
SUBSCRIPTION.faq_change_plan: Can I change my plan later?
SUBSCRIPTION.faq_change_plan_answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your billing page.
SUBSCRIPTION.faq_exceed_limit: What happens if I exceed my monthly limit?
SUBSCRIPTION.faq_exceed_limit_answer: You'll need to upgrade to a higher plan or wait until your next billing cycle.
SUBSCRIPTION.faq_payment_secure_answer: Absolutely! We use Stripe for payment processing, which is PCI-DSS compliant and trusted by millions of businesses.

library.title: Your Conversion Library
library.tooltip: View and manage all your completed and ongoing conversions. Download results or check conversion status.
library.no_conversions_description: No conversions found in your library
library.login_required: Please login to view your library

file_item.delete_dialog_description: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the file and all associated data.

file_list.title: Your Files
file_list.tooltip: Uploaded files ready to be converted. Click the convert button to start processing.
file_list.failed_to_load: Failed to load already uploaded files
file_list.monthly_limit_reached: Monthly conversion limit reached. Please upgrade to continue.

file_upload.auto_start_tooltip: Automatically start conversion immediately after file upload completes.

conversion_row.export_disabled_failed: Conversion failed. Please reach out to support for assistance.
conversion_row.export_disabled_processing: Conversion is not available yet. Please wait until the conversion is complete.
conversion_row.delete_dialog_description: Are you sure you want to delete this conversion? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the conversion and all associated data.
conversion_row.delete_info_message: Deleted conversions still count towards your monthly page quota.

status.finished_tooltip: Your conversion has been successfully completed and is ready to download.
status.queued_tooltip: Your conversion is waiting in the queue and will begin processing shortly.
status.processing_tooltip: Your conversion is currently being processed.
status.failed_tooltip: Your conversion encountered an error and could not be completed.
status.cancelled_tooltip: This conversion was cancelled and will not be completed.

CONVERSION.no_tables_description: This document doesn't contain any tables
CONVERSION.no_table_selected_description: Click on a table in the page viewer
CONVERSION.download_failed_description: Unable to download the PDF file. Please try again.
CONVERSION.not_found: Conversion not found. Please check the URL or log in to access this conversion.
CONVERSION.token_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again to access this conversion.
CONVERSION.conversion_failed: The conversion failed to process. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.

meta.title: Conversion Results
meta.description: View and export extracted tables from your PDF document. Download tables in CSV, Excel, JSON, or TSV format with GridExtract's powerful PDF to table conversion tool.
meta.description_with_filename: {filename} - View and export extracted tables from your PDF document. Download tables in CSV, Excel, JSON, or TSV format with GridExtract's powerful PDF to table conversion tool.

export_settings.title: Export Settings
export_settings.remove_empty_rows_hint: Exclude rows that contain only empty cells
export_settings.remove_empty_columns_hint: Exclude columns that contain only empty cells
export_settings.preserve_line_breaks_hint: Keep line breaks within cells in the exported data
export_settings.preserve_line_breaks_csv_note: Note: Cells with line breaks will be automatically quoted to maintain valid CSV/TSV format
export_settings.csv_delimiter_hint: Character to separate values in the output file
export_settings.tsv_delimiter_hint: Character to separate values in the output file
export_settings.include_bom_hint: Add Byte Order Mark for better Unicode compatibility
export_settings.quote_all_hint: Wrap all values in quotes, not just those with special characters
export_settings.excel_worksheet_hint: Create a separate worksheet for each table
export_settings.excel_gridlines_hint: Show cell borders in the Excel file
export_settings.excel_autofit_hint: Automatically adjust column widths based on content
export_settings.json_no_additional_settings: No additional settings available for JSON format

CONVERSION.restricted_page_description: This page is only available to Pro users. Upgrade to unlock all pages.
